title: About
subtitle: Who's Brandon? What is B²?
aboutDescription: B² Technical Solutions is a fully insured, sole proprietor LLC. As a fully insured IDM/IAM based corporation, Brandon Bollin can bring his SME background in the IDM/IAM space to your company for a fraction of the cost to hire a typical IT staffing company.
Brandon has worked as a 1099 and W2 based resource for many of these companies over the years. Why pay for a middleman when one can come to B² directly?
